name: Shoot the Dice
description:
This is a submission to the Mix and Game Jam 2020.

Its my first game made out during a game jam!

The game its a top-down shooter combined with a game of luck.

Once every 5 seconds the dice are rolled and a weapon is choosed.

Controls: 

  1.  w, a, s, d to move;
  2.  mouse to aim
  3.  mouse button-left to shoot

a link to the artists that made the music:

  •   http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/Karstenholymoly/62493 Ft: Platinum Butterfly
